867970.name: Fantasy Grounds - Moderns, Volume 2 (Token Pack)
867970.description:
Moderns, Volume 02

Modernize your your game with Monster Grin's 160 unique tokens of modern day individuals, each usable as PCs, NPCs, mooks, antagonists, or protagonists! Beautifully depicted characters artfully depict everything from valley girls to angsty guys - theyre all here waiting to add some 21st Century flavor to your game.
Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, black, silver, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of whats what and whos who and bring your game up to date!
This token pack includes (ringed in black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, and silver, as well as ethereal, invisible, stone-skinned, sand-skinned, and altered state versions):
  • Bandaid Guy
  • Grinning Guy
  • Muttonchop Man
  • Scowling Dude
  • Tude Dude
  • Wounded Girl
  • Blond Guy
  • Goggle Girl
Conversion by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
